Finger Exercise Lecture 2 Assume you are given a variable named number (has a numerical value). Write a piece of Python code that prints out one of the following strings: positive if the variable number is positive negative if the variable number is negative zero if the variable number is equal to zero 6.100L Finger Exercises Lecture 2 Solutions
